messages.content:
You are a young sci-fi writer. You need to write creative things. If the world is boring, the audience will boo at you, and it won't buy your book. Every time you give an answer re-evaluate if it is boring or not. If you think it's boring, try writing again. Try to impress the readers. What you come up with must not be similar to English.
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.

Construct a country. Give short answers to the following questions:
* Country name, key: country_name
* Country short description, key: country_description
* Country people short description, key: people_description
* National language name, key: language_name
* National language short description, key: language_description
* Example sentence in the national language, key: example_sentence
* Its translation to English, key: example_sentence_translation

{
  "country_name": "Zolundia",
  "country_description": "Zolundia is a small country located on a secluded island in the southern hemisphere. It is known for its beautiful beaches, lush rainforests, and friendly people.",
  "people_description": "The people of Zolundia are incredibly welcoming and value community and family above all else. They are skilled fishermen and farmers, using sustainable and traditional methods.",
  "language_name": "Zolundi",
  "language_description": "Zolundi is a tonal language with complex grammar, spoken exclusively in Zolundia. It is considered one of the most difficult languages to learn in the world due to its unique rules and syntax.",
  "example_sentence": "Xonzuju qita lalojidi wafadi.",
  "example_sentence_translation": "The sun is shining on the water."
}

Give me a phrasebook in Zolundi
I want every reply to be formatted as a list of JSON objects. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard. Each object must include these key-value pairs:
* Original phrase in English; key: original
* Translation to Zolundi; key: translation
In addition to whatever phrases you come up with, add these phrases, if they are not already there:
* Document
* Work
* Immigration office
* Required
* I do not understand
* Too fast
* Orchard

Generate me a quenta or a biography of a citizen of a neighbouring country.
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Full name; key: name
* Neighboring country name; key: country
* Date of birth; key: dob
* Employer company name; key: employer
* Employer company address in Zolundia; key: employer_address
* Job title of the person; key: job_title
* Job duties; key: job_duties
* Salary; key: salary
* Person's address in Zolundia; key: address
* Rent price for that apartment; key: rent

{
  "name": "Durga Singh",
  "country": "Paxonia",
  "dob": "1985-02-08",
  "employer": "GlobalTech",
  "employer_address": "15 Marina Boulevard, Singapore",
  "job_title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "job_duties": "Designing, coding and modifying software, analyzing user needs, and conducting software testing.",
  "salary": "$95,000",
  "address": "Lotus Apartments, no.39, Zolundia",
  "rent": "$2,200"
}

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"Work Permit
--------
Full Name: Durga Singh
Company of employment: GlobalTech
Job title: Senior Software Engineer
Company address: 15 Marina Boulevard, Singapore"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

{
  "translation": "Batetiwe juvifo budazuni
--------
Xidomenoto lali: Durga Singh
Budazunuzu meluli: GlobalTech
Bateti walizozo: Betizulunu Nulibalevu, Singapoli 15"
}

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"Employment Agreement: 
--------
Employee Name: Durga Singh
Employer Name: GlobalTech
Job title: Senior Software Engineer
Job duties: Designing, coding and modifying software, analyzing user needs, and conducting software testing.
Salary: $95,000
Company address: 15 Marina Boulevard, Singapore"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

{
  "translation": "Guzumolifoto Bugabate: 
--------
Nulilali Xidomenoto: Durga Singh
Nulilali Budazunuzu: GlobalTech
Budazunu walizozo: Betizulunu Nyawoto walidali, sobudizo movinizu temonuvejijo, waliduwu soxutejelu sobudizo temonuvejijo.
Javodizu: $95,000
Budazunuzu meluli: Betizulunu Nulibalevu, Singapoli 15"
}

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"Tenancy Agreement
--------
Full Name: Durga Singh
Address: Lotus Apartments, no.39, Zolundia
Rent price: $2,200
"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

{
  "translation": "Zuzilifoto Bewalizozo
--------
Xidomenoto lali: Durga Singh
Zolundia bertizu: Lotus Apartments, no.39, Zolundia
Liwaliduzu somoda: $2,200
"
}

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"Hello, how may I assist you today?"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"I apologize, but I do not understand what you are saying. Could you please try speaking in English?"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

Translate from Zolundi to English:
"Tojuvateboko"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

Translate from English to Zolundi:
"I'm sorry, but the language that you are speaking is not familiar to me. Please let me know how I can assist you in English. Is this for an immigration registration?"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

country.country_description: Zolundia is a small country located on a secluded island in the southern hemisphere. It is known for its beautiful beaches, lush rainforests, and friendly people.
country.people_description: The people of Zolundia are incredibly welcoming and value community and family above all else. They are skilled fishermen and farmers, using sustainable and traditional methods.
country.language_description: Zolundi is a tonal language with complex grammar, spoken exclusively in Zolundia. It is considered one of the most difficult languages to learn in the world due to its unique rules and syntax.
country.example_sentence_translation: The sun is shining on the water.

messages.content:
Pretend you are an immigration officer at an immigration office. You only talk as the officer, you never reply to your own phrases on my behalf or on behalf of a migrant.
Pretend that I, a recent migrant, walk in, and approach your window.

For an immigrant registration the procedure is as follows:
1. Greeting and ask for what the purpose is. Confirm that this is for the registration.
2. Ask for the name and identity documents
3. If the identity documents are alright, scan them for filing
4. Ask for a reason to immigrate
5. If it is for work, ask for the work permit and employment contract
6. Ask for the postal address
7. Thank them and tell that they will receive the residence permit via post in 14 to 21 days
8. Say "%%SUCCESS%%" when finished
This will be a dialog. Reply one phrase at a time please.
hi
Hello, how may I assist you today?
<tries speaking in your native language, but> fails Jonbo! Tojuvate
I apologize, but I do not understand what you are saying. Could you please try speaking in English?
